meanings.definition: A person who goes to the beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachgoer brought a towel and sunscreen to the shore.
meanings.sent2: Every weekend, the beachgoer relaxes by the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The beachgoer forgot their sunglasses and ended up squinting all day.
meanings.sent4: As the waves crashed, the beachgoer felt a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The beachgoer's love for the ocean was as deep as the sea itself.

meanings.definition: Someone who enjoys spending time at the beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachgoer always has a smile when feeling the sand between their toes.
meanings.sent2: During summer, the beachgoer can't wait to soak up the sun.
meanings.sent3: The beachgoer's collection of seashells grew bigger with each visit.
meanings.sent4: Like a seagull soaring above, the beachgoer felt free and content.
meanings.sent5: The beachgoer's laughter echoed along the coastline, blending with the sound of the waves.
